channel.title: Hoiw to make admin :(
channel.description: HOW TO MAKE ADMIN!!PLZ TELL MEE!!!

item.title: Hoiw to make admin :(
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

Bib, stop posting commands on topics where no one wants any commands…
And yeah they’re right.
1 = Moderator (Silver crown)
2 = Administrator (Golden crown)
3 = Owner (Still golden crown, but you can limit you’re administrators if you have 3 and they have 2…)

Read full topic

item.title: Hoiw to make admin :(
item.dc:creator: @GetOwned GetOwned
item.description:
@GetOwned wrote:

[quote=“pkaz 0wnt, post:4, topic:72132”][quote author=dylanzomg link=topic=105962.msg1062846#msg1062846 date=1175198737]
Go characters search the name from the person you want to make an admin
then search for player rights there will be a 0 change it to 3 for admin to 2 for moderator

[/quote]

wouldnt it be 0 for normal player 1 for moderator 2 for admin 3 for owner ?? i think so[/quote]

Yea, lol, its 1 mod, 2 admin, 3 owner, not 2 mod, 3 admin! hehe

Read full topic

item.title: Hoiw to make admin :(
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

Open up client.java.

search for this:

admin list, 1

If you scroll a little you should see something like this:

[code]if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“PLAYER NAME”))
{
playerRights = #;
}

			if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("PLAYERNAME"))
			{
				playerRights = #;
			}[/code]

Change the PLAYERNAME to the username you want to make admin/mod and change the # to either 1 for mod, 2 for staff or 3 for admin, ( in ur case 3)

Read full topic
